p.k: Period melodrama with Kathleen Ryan. After a tough childhood, Esther is sent away to become a maid, but gets pregnant when seduced by a servant (Dirk Bogarde)
Noir thriller starring Alan Ladd, Phyllis Calvert and Paul Stewart. A postal inspector infiltrates a gang planning a huge heist. But he must also protect
Classic western. James Stewart plays a stranger who arrives in a remote New Mexico town secretly seeking his brother's killer. With Donald Crisp
John Mills, Michael Redgrave and Trevor Howard star in this Second World War drama exploring the relationships that form on an RAF base when a US squadron arrives
Comedy-drama with James Gandolfini and Julia Louis-Dreyfus. Two divorcees start to date. But she also begins a secret friendship that may threaten the relationship
Bank heist thriller. Jason Statham stars as the leader of a gang of thieves whose lucrative job lands them in grave danger. Very strong language/violence/sexual scenes
Comedy-drama with Gemma Arterton and Jason Flemyng. An English couple move to a French village, where a book-loving baker fears they are headed for tragedy. Sexual scenes
Stylised thriller with Samantha Robinson. In 1960s California, a woman uses occult potions and spells in her troubled quest for love. Nudity/sex/violence/gory images
